known_limitations.description: Concurrent assertion statements with action blocks are not supported yet in CIRCT's ImportVerilog

icarus.output: bug.sv:3: syntax error - Error in property_spec of concurrent assertion item
icarus.note: Icarus Verilog has limited SVA support

classification.reason: The test case uses valid IEEE 1800-2017 SystemVerilog syntax (concurrent assertion with action block) that is not yet implemented in CIRCT. Both slang and verilator accept the syntax, confirming it is valid SV. The CIRCT error message explicitly states 'not supported yet', indicating a known limitation rather than a bug.
